Returns: Return true to proceed with the current drawing pass, or false to cancel.
onPreDraw().Description: Callback method to be invoked when the view tree is about to be drawn. At this point, all views in the tree have been measured and given a frame. Clients can use this to adjust their scroll bounds or even to request a new layout before drawing occurs.

ClassDesc: Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the view tree is about to be drawn.
